mods.abstract: $20 Reward. RUNAWAY from the undersigned, in the Parish of St. Martin, on the 20th September inst. a griff-boy, named BOB, aged about 30 years, about 5 feet, 9 inches high, having a bump on the left hand's thumb, & a white spot on the little finger of the right hand. --Speaks english and very little french The above reward will be paid for his delivery to me, or to James M Young in St. Landry, and the usual reward if lodged in jail. THELESPHORE AMY. St. Martins, Sept. 29th, 1855.--2t.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
